Name: Knockout Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with mint leaf floated in the centre of the cocktail.
Review: A Wet Martini with hints of aniseed and mint. Stir well as it benefits from dilution.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry MacElhone 's 1922 Harry's ABC of Mixing Cocktails and his 1923 Harry of Ciro's ABC of Mixing Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Knockout Martini contains 201 calories
